column2: Rewrite (* Means that the task has been adapted for the context of the experiment.)

Print the number of lines in the syllabus file

Show which file diff between in 'content/labs' and 'content/lessons', including their subdirectories

Find all lines containing "why" in files containing "review" in their filename
Count the number of files in 'labs/' and subfolders
List the name of the immediate subfolders contained in the folders at the root of 'content/'
Display the content of the root folder ordered by directory first
